name: Sea Hunter
text: Your blows knock swimming opponents off balance.
benefit: When you make a successful melee attack against a swimming target, as a free action you can attempt to knock the target off balance. Treat this as a trip combat maneuver. If you succeed, the target is considered off balance until it recovers its balance, usually by making a Swim check on its turn. This feat has no effect on creatures with a swim speed, those using magic such as freedom of movement, and creatures that can’t be tripped.
staminaText: When you successfully knock a target off balance while using this feat, you can spend up to 5 stamina points to apply a penalty on the target’s Swim checks to recover its balance from the effect equal to the number of stamina points you spent.
text_zh: 你的攻击让游泳中的对手失去平衡。
benefit_zh: 当你对一名正在游泳的目标进行了一次成功的近战攻击时，你可以以一个自由动作尝试让目标失去平衡。将这个动作视作一个绊摔战技。若你成功，目标会被视为失去平衡（参见水下战斗规则）直到它重新恢复平衡（通常是在它的行动轮进行一次游泳检定）。这一专长对具有游泳速度的、处于‘行动自如’或类似魔法效果、以及无法被绊摔的生物无效。
staminaText_zh: 当你在使用这个专长成功将一个目标击倒至失衡时，你可以消耗至多5点耐力来让目标在用于恢复平衡的游泳检定上获得减值，这个减值等于你所消耗的耐力。
